snippet.title: Spread: Transmission - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Charge, spread and take over your opponents’ cells in the turn-based casual strategy board game Spread: Transmission! Assert your dominance across various unique islands. The game is not over until the last charge is captured, so flip the board with a thought-out move. 

Spread: Transmission is coming to Steam soon!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1926500/Spread_Transmission/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=Announcement_Trailer
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/KSVeUsmXDK
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cxvedev
We are also on Twitch: https://twitch.tv/cxve
